name: Bankotsu, Band of Seven
effect:

Blue: 6
Green: 4

Evil - Human - Male - Unique
Once per turn when /Bankotsu/ defeats a character, you may discard 2 cards from hand to ready /Bankotsu/. (*) While you control 2 or more other characters with "Band of Seven" in the title, /Bankotsu/ cannot be attacked by characters with a printed deck cost of 3 or less.

name: Terrorize
effect: Play at the start of Battle and only if you control 3 or more Spawn. All characters' color values are their printed values and cannot be raised or lowered. (*) Limit 2 copies per deck.

name: The Backlash Wave
effect: Play when a character that has /Tetsusaiga/ attached is attacked. Your attacked character gains +3 to all colors for this attack. If your character is not defeated from this attack and your opponent posseses more shards than you, defeat the attacking character. (*) Limit once per turn. (*) Limit two copies per deck. (*) Remove from the game after use.
